metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0179 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high.
metadata.Description:
A buffer overflow vulnerability was found in the Netfilter subsystem in the Linux Kernel. This issue could allow the leakage of both stack and heap addresses, and potentially allow Local Privilege Escalation to the root user via arbitrary code execution. Davide Ornaghi discovered that the netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly handle VLAN headers in some situations. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0179` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.1.0-16-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-6.1.0-16-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-16-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-16-generic-64k - 6.1.0-16.16
No subscription required

linux-image-6.1.0-16-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-6.1.0-16-generic-lpae - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-16-generic - 6.1.0-16.16
linux-image-unsigned-6.1.0-16-generic-64k - 6.1.0-16.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-16.16').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needed').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-signed package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1.0-16.16').
linux-signed-aws package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-gcp package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needed').
linux-signed-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-lowlatency package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-signed-oracle package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
